@description.name: @description
@description.body: Normalization for the track gesture. This gesture is based on Pointer events, meaning that it's available on all devices, no matter which input device type is used (e.g. mouse or touchscreen).

@description.name: @description
@description.body: List of event types to be normalized

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns a map with the calculated delta coordinates and axis, relative to the position on trackstart event.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Map} a map with contains the delta as x and y and the movement axis as axis.
@return.description: a map with contains the delta as x and y and the movement axis as axis.

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Manipulates the native event object, adding methods if they're not
already present

@param.name: @param
@param.body: element {Element} DOM element the listener was attached to
@param.description: DOM element the listener was attached to
